91311.text: Fixing race condition with EndpointSlice controller garbage collection.
91311.markdown: Fixing race condition with EndpointSlice controller garbage collection. ([#91311](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/91311), [@robscott](https://github.com/robscott)) [SIG Apps, Network and Testing]
91311.author: robscott

91399.text:
Fixed the EndpointSliceController to correctly create endpoints for IPv6-only pods.

Fixed the EndpointController to allow IPv6 headless services, if the IPv6DualStack
feature gate is enabled, by specifying `ipFamily: IPv6` on the service. (This already
worked with the EndpointSliceController.)
91399.markdown:
Fixed the EndpointSliceController to correctly create endpoints for IPv6-only pods.
  
  Fixed the EndpointController to allow IPv6 headless services, if the IPv6DualStack
  feature gate is enabled, by specifying `ipFamily: IPv6` on the service. (This already
  worked with the EndpointSliceController.) ([#91399](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/91399), [@danwinship](https://github.com/danwinship)) [SIG Apps and Network]
91399.author: danwinship

92331.text: fix: incorrect max azure disk max count
92331.markdown: Fix: incorrect max azure disk max count ([#92331](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/92331), [@andyzhangx](https://github.com/andyzhangx)) [SIG Cloud Provider and Storage]
92331.author: andyzhangx

92878.text: Fixes the flooding warning messages about setting volume ownership for configmap/secret volumes
92878.markdown: Fixes the flooding warning messages about setting volume ownership for configmap/secret volumes ([#92878](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/92878), [@jvanz](https://github.com/jvanz)) [SIG Instrumentation, Node and Storage]
92878.author: jvanz

93515.text: use NLB Subnet CIDRs instead of VPC CIDRs in Health Check SG Rules

93567.markdown: Fix calling AttachDisk on a previously attached EBS volume ([#93567](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93567), [@gnufied](https://github.com/gnufied)) [SIG Cloud Provider, Storage and Testing]
93567.author: gnufied

93722.text: Fixes a bug evicting pods after a taint with a limited tolerationSeconds toleration is removed from a node
93722.markdown: Fixes a bug evicting pods after a taint with a limited tolerationSeconds toleration is removed from a node ([#93722](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93722), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG Apps and Node]
93722.author: liggitt

93758.text: Pod Affinity/AntiAffinity label selectors are now validated in the pod affinity score plugin
93758.markdown: Pod Affinity/AntiAffinity label selectors are now validated in the pod affinity score plugin ([#93758](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93758), [@damemi](https://github.com/damemi)) [SIG Scheduling]
93758.author: damemi

93773.text: Fix a concurrent map writes error in kubelet
93773.markdown: Fix a concurrent map writes error in kubelet ([#93773](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93773), [@knight42](https://github.com/knight42)) [SIG Node]
93773.author: knight42

93790.text: Fixes an issue that can result in namespaced custom resources being orphaned when their namespace is deleted, if the CRD defining the custom resource is removed concurrently with namespaces being deleted, then recreated.
93790.markdown: Fixes an issue that can result in namespaced custom resources being orphaned when their namespace is deleted, if the CRD defining the custom resource is removed concurrently with namespaces being deleted, then recreated. ([#93790](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93790), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt)) [SIG API Machinery and Apps]
93790.author: liggitt

93892.text: "unbound immediate PersistentVolumeClaims" causes UnschedulableAndUnresolvable status rather than an Error in the scheduler.
93892.markdown: "unbound immediate PersistentVolumeClaims" causes UnschedulableAndUnresolvable status rather than an Error in the scheduler. ([#93892](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93892), [@ahg-g](https://github.com/ahg-g)) [SIG Apps and Storage]
93892.author: ahg-g

93964.text: Scheduler bugfix: Scheduler doesn't lose pod information when nodes are quickly recreated. This could happen when nodes are restarted or quickly recreated reusing a nodename.
93964.markdown: Scheduler bugfix: Scheduler doesn't lose pod information when nodes are quickly recreated. This could happen when nodes are restarted or quickly recreated reusing a nodename. ([#93964](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/93964), [@alculquicondor](https://github.com/alculquicondor)) [SIG Scheduling and Testing]
93964.author: alculquicondor

94002.text: kube-apiserver: fixed a bug returning inconsistent results from list requests which set a field or label selector and set a paging limit
94002.markdown: Kube-apiserver: fixed a bug returning inconsistent results from list requests which set a field or label selector and set a paging limit ([#94002](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/94002), [@wojtek-t](https://github.com/wojtek-t)) [SIG API Machinery]
94002.author: wojtek-t

94086.text: The EndpointSlice controller now waits for EndpointSlice and Node caches to be synced before starting.
94086.markdown: The EndpointSlice controller now waits for EndpointSlice and Node caches to be synced before starting. ([#94086](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/94086), [@robscott](https://github.com/robscott)) [SIG Apps and Network]
94086.author: robscott

94226.text:
$ kubectl get event
LAST SEEN   TYPE     REASON              OBJECT                        MESSAGE
<unknown>   Normal   Scheduled           pod/nginx-6c975b59f8-gvmjr    Successfully assigned default/nginx-6c975b59f8-gvmjr to minikube

$ kubectl describe pod xxx
......
Events:
  Type    Reason     Age        From               Message
  ----    ------     ----       ----               -------
  Normal  Scheduled  <unknown>  default-scheduler  Successfully assigned default/nginx-6c975b59f8-gvmjr to minikube
......
94226.markdown:

  LAST SEEN   TYPE     REASON              OBJECT                        MESSAGE
  <unknown>   Normal   Scheduled           pod/nginx-6c975b59f8-gvmjr    Successfully assigned default/nginx-6c975b59f8-gvmjr to minikube
  
  $ kubectl describe pod xxx
  ......
  Events:
    Type    Reason     Age        From               Message
    ----    ------     ----       ----               -------
    Normal  Scheduled  <unknown>  default-scheduler  Successfully assigned default/nginx-6c975b59f8-gvmjr to minikube
  ...... ([#94226](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/94226), [@ingvagabund](https://github.com/ingvagabund)) [SIG CLI]

94409.text:
upon successful authorization check, an impersonated user is added to the system:authenticated group.
system:anonymous when impersonated is added to the system:unauthenticated group.
94409.markdown:
Upon successful authorization check, an impersonated user is added to the system:authenticated group.
  system:anonymous when impersonated is added to the system:unauthenticated group. ([#94409](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/94409), [@tkashem](https://github.com/tkashem)) [SIG API Machinery and Testing]
94409.author: tkashem
